name: ViralViralVideos.com Cleanup & Bigger Videos
description:
This style cleans up all kinds of ads and social buttons (share, like, tweet etc.) on Viralviralvideos.com
It also minimalizes the page design and increases the youtube video-frames for maximum viewing plasure.


Feedback is always welcome.
additional_info:
Changelog
  • Version 0.2 (released 22. Feb 2013):
    • fixed the @-moz-document rule. Style now applies for the whole domain Viralviralvideos.com
    • increased the height of youtube video frame.
  • Version 0.1 (released 21.Feb 2013)
